title: Microsoft Office 2007 for Mac Hebrew language.zip
description:
As you know, there is no RTL support for Microsoft Office for Mac.

I made 2 apps Word and PowerPoint from Windows version of Office 2007, like Mac native applications.

If you want to change the language, just right click on the app and select show content, then double click wineskin. Choose to install software, and install your language pack if you have one.

These apps were tested on El Capitan
